definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

near in time/in the near future/very soon/recent

the corresponding time period (in a different year etc)/concurrent/synchronous

at set dates/at regular intervals/periodic/limited to a fixed period of time/fixed term

sentences.english: Complete disintegration of cytoplasm at stage of vacuolated microspore.
sentences.chinese: 单核液泡期的小孢子细胞质完全解体。

sentences.english: Different irrigation maximums also influenced plant significantly at blooming and fruit-bearing stage.
sentences.chinese: 不同灌水上限对开花结果期也有显著影响。

sentences.english: Perhaps, but many entrepreneurs go through a grind-it-out phase.
sentences.chinese: 可能吧，但大部分创业者都会经历一个艰难期。

sentences.english: I can't imagine what it will say.
sentences.chinese: 我无法想象这期节目将要说什么。

sentences.english: But who loses their jobs at the mass layoffs?
sentences.chinese: 但在大规模失业期，没工作的是谁呢？

sentences.english: Thee ends of the earth have made, only Shien infinite period.
sentences.chinese: 天涯海角有尽处，只有师恩无穷期。

sentences.english: Commercial projects need to be financed in operation period.
sentences.chinese: 运营期融资主要是针对商业房地产项目而成立。

sentences.english: Many stock markets around the world exist a pre-opening period before trading actually occurs.
sentences.chinese: 股市开市前议价期存在于世界一些主要证券交易所。

sentences.english: Changes in proteins of Semimembranosus and Biceps muscles mainly happened during curing and fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 股二头肌的蛋白质降解主要是在腌制期和发酵中后期。

sentences.english: Normal range of the pituitary response during early follicular phase was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了早卵泡期妇女正常反应范围。

sentences.english: So, the oral stage is when you start off.
Heat acclimatization lowered the level of the second peak, though it was remarkably prolonged.
sentences.chinese: 犬热习服后可以降低第2峰的高度并且延长其平台期。

sentences.english: And his orality could be described literally.
sentences.chinese: 口唇期人格有一些具体的表现。
设置合理的冷静期制度。

sentences.english: Conclusion The placenta might be an another hematopoietic organ in ontogeny .
sentences.chinese: 结论胎盘是胎儿期造血器官之一。

sentences.english: Assists in purchase of required furniture and IT equipment and manages all warranties.
sentences.chinese: 采购必要的家具和IT设备并且管理好质保期。
